episodes.title: Bijlee Ka Bill
episodes.plot: Mishra house has received an inflated electricity bill. While a lot of speculation goes into how the bill has exceeded all limits, it is revealed that this problem has struck other households in the colony as well. This lands a great opportunity for Santosh Mishra to make some extra bucks and fulfill a few small dreams of the family.

episodes.title: Cheeni Kam, Paani Zyaada
episodes.plot: Shanti Mishra is dragged to a free medical camp and is diagnosed with diabetes. There is a kitty party round the corner and she is in no mood to cancel the same. Mishraji realizes it and says that the boys will do the preparation.

episodes.title: Saparivaar
episodes.plot: Annu is summoned to Pinky Mama's house as his daughter Raanu is getting married. The entire family gets excited and starts preparing. But the excitement disappears soon when the wedding card arrives and doesn't mention 'Saparivaar'.

episodes.title: Kal Board ka Paper hai
episodes.plot: It's board exams of Aman Mishra tomorrow and today is match between India and Pakistan at night and everyone is excited to watch it but there are other plans for Aman.

episodes.title: Kiraana
episodes.plot: D day for Mishra family. Today is the day Annu is supposed to get his gas agency license and Aman gets his board results. A big day for them both.
